title.en: Shihon Shugi no Seishin - Der Geist des Kapitarismus

description.en:
### The Spirit Of Capitalism

Sayuri is a hard-working OL, the unsung heroine of Japan’s modern economy. With the help of her horny colleague Keiko and eager understudy Mayu-tan, the girls will lower office stress and keep spirits high…and make their way to another year of record profitability for the company!
